com.stl.skipthelibrary

Class BookRecyclerAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<BookRecyclerAdapter.ViewHolder>
      • com.stl.skipthelibrary.BookRecyclerAdapter

  • public class BookRecyclerAdapter
extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<BookRecyclerAdapter.ViewHolder>
    The recycler adapter for books. Used to display a list of books.
